name: Warped: The unusual time collapse
description:
WARPED

Ever Imagined what if time goes other way around? If clocks show up vague  and weird numbers and the needles rotate anti clockwise the world sees a very unusual situation. 

Our story is about a kid named "Suraj" who witnesses this collapse in the clocks around him but unfortunately he gets warped into time dimension sending him to unknown, hostile and dangerous areas of the world. 

HE HAS TO COLLECT ALL THE VALUABLES IN ORDER TO FIX THE TIME OF CLOCKS AND DURING HIS UNEXPECTED AND THRILLING ADVENTURE HE HAS TO BE WATCHFUL OF THE OBJECTS THAT HE SEES BECAUSE THOSE ARE NOW NOT WHAT HE EXPECTS THEM TO BE.....This is the most unusual journey that he has to take in order to fix this mighty TIME COLLAPSE and prevent others from BEING WARPED!!!!!!!!!! 

CONTROLS:

 LEFT,  RIGHT: For movement

SPACEBAR: Jump

TIP: Use the springs to jump higher and use the levers to open the gates of various zones of the level. Watch out of the fruits/food as these have been adulterated, be careful of the wild creatures roaming around.....and pay extra caution to the hidden traps all the way to reach the final check post.
